examples: Anoectochilus tetsuoi Ohwi ex Hatus. & T.Amano Fl. Okinawa S. Ryukyu I. 148. 1958 ; ed. 2. 163. 1967, nom. inval.
notes: Kanashiro, Tetsuo before World War II.
source: R.E.G.Pichi Sermolli 1 March 1991.  Dates and name note from D.Boufford.  See also: E.H.Walker, Fl. Okinawa & South. Ryuku Is: 1095 (1976)
